front.title: Methodology for Benchmarking MPLS-TE Fast Reroute Protection

abstract.t: This draft describes the methodology for benchmarking MPLS Fast Reroute (FRR) protection mechanisms for link and node protection. This document provides test methodologies and testbed setup for measuring failover times of Fast Reroute techniques while considering factors (such as underlying links) that might impact recovery times for real-time applications bound to MPLS traffic engineered (MPLS-TE) tunnels.
